title: Context-Based Learning Workshop for Mathematical Terminology Acquisition for Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Possession of Basic Vocabulary Related to Workplace Tasks
context.additional_context: Enhancing the ability to interpret work-related documents by mastering specialized mathematical terminology, with supplementary materials accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce the accurate spellings of 20 work-related math terms with over 80% accuracy after three or more exposures.
Learners can infer the meanings of new math terms with over 70% accuracy using contextual clues.
Learners can apply math terminology acquired during project execution to real work cases and write reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
